question: Complete and repair the code so that in the following sentence 'I play with my dog.' every consonant is replaced with '%' and every vowel is replaced with '$'. Print the new Text in one line.
code:
txt = "I play with my Dog."
vowel  = "aeiou"
consonant= "BCDFGHJKLMNPQRSTVWXYZ"
for txt
	if txt =  vowel
		txt = "%"
	if txt = consonant
		txt = "$"
	else:
		txt = txt
print(txt)
